page.title: 04 TONNA HOSPITAL
page.content: The hospital was built in{1939 by L.Gower and Sons.Since then,Ward 3 has been added.It was first used as an {Isolation hospital.}Later it was used for children with ear,nose and throat problems.Today it is a geriatric hospital and day centre for the aged. There are only two wards open,each has 18 people.The hospital has two doctors a consultant,a registrar and ten nurses.The visiting times are unrestricted. There are plans to change the hospital tremendously in the future as they hope to convert the wards into family units where people can be more relaxed and feel at home. The patients usually stay for 6 to 8 weeks,but some just come for a very short time to give their family a break.The oldest patient is 98.
